TEXT.TITLE: <CONSOLIDATED PLANTATIONS BHD>
TEXT.BODY: Six months to December 31 SHR 2.6 cents vs 5.2 cents Interim dividend four cents vs same Group net 12.4 mln ringgit vs 24.3 mln Pre-tax 26.6 mln vs 53.5 mln Turnover 235.3 mln vs 333.9 mln Note - dividend pay April 30, register April 3. REUTER
